datasetParam.name: snp_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of SNP ids, or upload a file

stringParam.name: set_a_count
stringParam.prompt: Minimum number of isolates in Set A with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the number of isolates in set A that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this number should be equal to the number of isolate identifiers in set A.

stringParam.name: set_b_count
stringParam.prompt: Minimum number of isolates in Set B with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the number of isolates in set B that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this number should be equal to the number of isolate identifiers in set B.

stringParam.name: MinPercentMinorAlleles
stringParam.help: This parameter applies to your group of isolates. A SNP can occur in any number of isolates in your group and the frequency of the least frequent allele across all isolates is the Minor Allele Frequency. A SNP will be returned by the search if the frequency of the minor allele is equal to or greater than your Minor Allele Frequency.

stringParam.name: set_a_percent
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the percentage of isolates in set A that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this percentage should be 100.

stringParam.name: set_b_percent
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the percentage of isolates in set B that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this percentage should be 100.

stringParam.name: isolate_count
stringParam.prompt: Minimum number of isolates with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the number of isolates in the set that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this number should be equal to the number of isolate identifiers

stringParam.name: set_percent
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the percentage of isolates in set B that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this percentage should be 100.

sqlQuery.name: snps_only
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct src.type AS term, src.type AS internal FROM ApidbTuning.SnpChipAttributes src WHERE organism = ($$organism$$) ORDER BY src.type
